localizedText.Layout_Controller_Reset_Confirm: Do your really want to reset these layout configurations?! All current layouts and interactive charts of the selected user will be deleted permanently. Reset anyway?
localizedText.Layout_Controller_Import_Confirm: Do your really want to import these layout configurations?! All current layouts and interactive charts of the selected user will be deleted permanently. Import anyway?
localizedText.Layout_Controller_Share_Confirm: Do your really want to reference these layout configurations?! All current layouts and interactive charts of the selected user will be deleted permanently. Share anyway?
